greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into exactly seven positive triangular numbers.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 7..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(k=0, 1, 0), `if`(
k>n or i*k<n, 0, b(n, h(i-1), k)+b(n-i, h(min(n-i, i)), k-1)))
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 28 2018
